text: "Face the Day" is a 1980 song by Australian rock band The Angels. It is the third single from their fourth studio album Dark Room and went to number 67 in Australia and number 30 in New Zealand. It was covered by Great White in 1986 for their second studio album Shot in the Dark. == Track listing == ; EPIC ES510 # Face the Day (Doc Neeson, John Brewster, Richard Brewster) - 4:07 # Public Enemy (Doc Neeson, John Brewster, Richard Brewster, Chris Bailey) - 2:58 Category:1980 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:The Angels (Australian band) songs
title: Face the Day (The Angels song)
